privacy_policy_content:
Last Updated: January 10, 2026

1. Data Controller
Mykoc values your privacy and processes your personal data in compliance with global data protection standards (including GDPR and local regulations).

2. Data Collected
The following data is collected during your use of the app:
‚Ä¢ Identity & Contact: Name, surname, email address, and phone number.
‚Ä¢ Educational Data: Enrolled classes, mentor/student assignments, and classroom interactions.
‚Ä¢ Technical Data: Device model, OS version, FCM token for notifications, and usage analytics.

3. Purpose of Processing
Your data is used to: create and manage user accounts, facilitate mentor-student communication, verify subscription status, provide technical support, and meet legal requirements.

4. Data Storage and Transfer
Your data is securely stored on Google Firebase servers. We do not sell or share your personal data with third parties for marketing purposes. Data is only shared with service providers (like notification services) necessary to perform the app's functions.

5. User Rights
You have the right to access your data, request corrections, or request the permanent deletion of your account (Right to be Forgotten). You can exercise these rights through the 'Delete Account' feature in the app settings.
terms_of_use_content:
Last Updated: January 10, 2026

1. Description of Service
Mykoc is a management platform designed to digitize the coaching and mentoring processes between mentors and students.

2. Membership and Security
‚Ä¢ You are responsible for providing accurate information during registration.
‚Ä¢ You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.

3. Mentor and Student Conduct
‚Ä¢ Mentors are solely responsible for the content of their classes and the guidance provided to students.
‚Ä¢ Students may only join classes using valid codes provided by authorized mentors.
‚Ä¢ Any form of harassment, hate speech, or intellectual property infringement will result in immediate account termination.

4. Subscriptions and Payments
‚Ä¢ Premium features may require a paid subscription. 
‚Ä¢ Subscriptions and refunds are managed via Google Play Store or Apple App Store. Mykoc adheres to the payment policies of these platforms.

5. Intellectual Property
All app designs, software code, and logos are the exclusive property of Mykoc. Unauthorized copying, distribution, or reverse engineering is strictly prohibited.

6. Disclaimer of Warranties
Mykoc provides the service on an 'as-is' basis. We are not liable for data loss, server downtime, or the quality of educational content provided by individual mentors.

7. Changes to Terms
Mykoc reserves the right to modify these terms at any time. Your continued use of the app after changes are posted constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
help_support_content:
How can we help you?

1. Frequently Asked Questions

‚Ä¢ How do I share the Class Code?
As a mentor, once you create a class, you can find the unique code on the class details screen and share it with your students.

‚Ä¢ How can I cancel my subscription?
Subscriptions are managed through the Apple App Store or Google Play Store. You can cancel at any time via your store account settings.

‚Ä¢ Is my data secure?
Yes, all your data is stored encrypted within the Google Firebase infrastructure.

‚Ä¢ I forgot my password, what should I do?
Click the 'Forgot Password' button on the login screen to receive a reset link via your email.

2. Contact Us

For technical issues or suggestions, you can reach us through the following channels:

‚Ä¢ Email: mykoc@gmail.com

We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 hours.
